bibl.bibl: Crotch, William Duppa. 1876. On the migration and habits of the Norwegian lemming. [Read 4 May 1876.] Additional note relative to the Norwegian lemming. [Read 15 June 1876.] Further remarks on the lemming. [Read 2 November 1876.] Journal of the Linnean Society (Zoology) 13 (1878): 27–34, 83, 157–60.
